Opening, Paying to, and Closing a Payment Channel REST API

    GET http://payment.21.co/<channel>
        -> No body.

        <- 200 - Merchant Pubkey
        {
            "pubkey": "019032910912091021..."
        }

    POST http://payment.21.co/<channel>

        -> Half-signed Refund Transaction, Customer Pubkey
        {
            "refund_tx": "",
        }

        <- 200 - Signed Refund Transaction
        {
            "deposit_txid": "f07b3af56c65ffc350b4fbc8c26ad2bc1b9fda73c74f053a4f0b7bbfa46937c3",
            "refund_tx": ""
        }

    GET http://payment.21.co/f07b3af56c65ffc350b4fbc8c26ad2bc1b9fda73c74f053a4f0b7bbfa46937c3

        -> No body.

        <- 200 - Status.
        {
            "state": "confirming",
            "balance": 100000,
            "deposit": 100000,
            ...
        }


    PUT http://payment.21.co/f07b3af56c65ffc350b4fbc8c26ad2bc1b9fda73c74f053a4f0b7bbfa46937c3

        -> Deposit Transaction
        {
            "deposit_tx": ""
        }

        <- 200 - No body.

    PUT http://payment.21.co/f07b3af56c65ffc350b4fbc8c26ad2bc1b9fda73c74f053a4f0b7bbfa46937c3

        -> Payment Transaction
        {
            "payment_tx": ""
        }

        <- 200 - Signed Payment Transaction txid
        {
            "payment_txid": "d47e9ad295f790a3d8254092fa3a02d4478070ba25b2c6812736390e8e9d963f"
        }

    DELETE http://payment.21.co/f07b3af56c65ffc350b4fbc8c26ad2bc1b9fda73c74f053a4f0b7bbfa46937c3

        -> No body.

        <- 200 - Payment transaction.
        {
            "payment_txid": "d47e9ad295f790a3d8254092fa3a02d4478070ba25b2c6812736390e8e9d963f"
        }
